```py
1\. # File name: hello.py
2\. import kivy
3\. kivy.require('1.9.0')
4\. 
5\. from kivy.app import App
6\. from kivy.uix.button import Label
7\. 
8\. class HelloApp(App):
9\.     def build(self):
10         return Label(text='Hello World!')
11\. 
12\. if __name__=="__main__":
13\.         HelloApp().run()
```
